function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inequality and inequitable access to services can put the entire city at risk of further diffusion of the virus.","Impact":"Limited post-pandemic actions towards reducing inequalities and addressing the needs of minorities and poor groups.","Mitigation":"Implement more inclusive planning and policies to address inequality challenges.","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, data analytics for targeted intervention.","People":"Minorities, poor groups, vulnerable populations.","Owner":"City councils, government, community organizations."},{"Description":"Increase in social tensions caused by pandemics, leading to stigmatization and mental health problems for migrant communities.","Impact":"Fuels racist sentiments and social tensions between migrant groups and host communities.","Mitigation":"Ensure COVID-19 response and control measures do not result in human rights abuse, racism, or classism.","Technologies":"Public health education, community outreach, multicultural awareness programs.","People":"Migrant communities, host communities, minority groups.","Owner":"Local governments, community organizations, public health agencies."},{"Description":"Diminishing sense of community in some cities due to the pandemic.","Impact":"Reduced social support, exacerbation of mental health issues, and decreased community resilience.","Mitigation":"Promote community engagement and social support initiatives to rebuild the sense of community.","Technologies":"Online community platforms, virtual events, mental health support apps.","People":"Residents of affected cities, especially vulnerable groups.","Owner":"Community organizations, mental health services, local governments."}]}
